page.title: 18Community and Hall
page.content:
The{Community Council}is the lowest tier of local goverment.It is as follows:- Chairman {Mr J.Skea} Vice president {Mrs S.Baird Secretary { Mr C.Nichol} Treasurer {Mr P.Guest Committee {Mr M.McCabe, Mr J.Foote, {Mr G.Brough, Mr R.Wallace, Mr G.Soutar
The{Hall Committee}is a body elected to manage the Village Hall.In addition to the elected members there are representatives of all the organizations.The elected members are: Chairman { Mrs J.Wilson} Secretary { Mr A.Spalding} Treasurer { Mrs I.Kenhard} Committee {Mrs N.Low, Mrs J.Christie, {Mrs D.Johnstone, Mr A.Macleod, {Mr J.Skelly} {
